function.name: cookingTemperature_increase
function.description: This function is used to increase the temperature of the cooker.

location.description: The location where the device is located.

room.description: The room where the device is located.

device.description: The name or type of the device to increase the temperature.

predefinedCompartment.description: The specific compartment within the device to increase the temperature.

cookingTemperatureDelta.description: The amount by which to increase the cooking temperature.
